sourcesContent:
import { IoMdClose, IoMdRemove, IoMdAdd } from 'react-icons/io' import { CartContext } from './CartContext'; import { useContext } from 'react'; const CartCard = ({ item }) => { const { removeFromCart, increaseAmount, decreaseAmount } = useContext(CartContext); const {id, title, image, price, amount} = item; return
{title}
{/* remove item */}
removeFromCart(id)} className='text-xl hover:cursor-pointer'>
{/* buttons */}
decreaseAmount(id)} className='flex-1 flex justify-center items-center cursor-pointer transition hover:text-black text-gray-500'>
{amount}
increaseAmount(id)} className='flex-1 h-full flex justify-center items-center cursor-pointer transition hover:text-black text-gray-500'>
{/* item price */}
${parseFloat(price).toFixed(2)}
} export default CartCard
